verbose_text: On the other hand, cell surface expression of vesicular stomatitis virus G (VSVG) protein, a well studied marker for the constitutive secretory pathway, was reported to be significantly retarded by knockdown of Exo70, suggesting that the exocyst is required for constitutive exocytosis of VSVG at the PM.
